name: Rate of wages for laborers and mechanics
text: [§201H-53]  Rate of wages for laborers and mechanics.  The corporation shall require an eligible bidder or eligible developer of a housing project developed under this part to comply with the requirements of section 104-2 for those laborers and mechanics hired to work on that housing project; provided that this section shall not apply to a housing project developed under this part if the entire cost of the project is less than $500,000 and the eligible bidder or eligible developer is a private nonprofit organization. [L 2006, c 180, pt of §3]
